channel.title: Settup SRL so it changes from 1 account to a nother
channel.description:
I was wondering if some1 could please write a tut on how to set it up Scar so it swaps from 1 account 2 another using one of the newer SRL scripts with this function
i believe this would help ALOT of people :D

item.title: Settup SRL so it changes from 1 account to a nother
item.dc:creator: @ScarScape ScarScape
item.description:
@ScarScape wrote:

[scar]program New;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
procedure Declareplayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers:=2;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer:=0;

 Players[0].Name :='Player 1';
 Players[0].Pass :='';
 Players[0].Nick :='';
 Players[0].Loc  :='';
 Players[0].Active:=True;
 
 Players[1].Name :='Player 2';
 Players[1].Pass :='';
 Players[1].Nick :='';
 Players[1].Loc  :='';
 Players[1].Active:=True;

end;

procedure Next;
begin
NextPlayer(true)
end;

begin
SetUpSRL;
Declareplayers;
Next;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
